sqlMap.sql: h.history_id historyId, h.corp_id corpId, h.user_id userId, h.login_time loginTime, h.login_ip loginIp, h.region region, h.client client, h.result result

where date_format(h.login_time, '%y-%m-%d') >= date_format(date_sub(now(), interval 30 day), '%y-%m-%d')
h.user_id = #userId#
sqlMap.insert: insert into login_history ( corp_id, user_id, login_time, login_ip, region, client, result ) values ( #corpId#, #userId#, now(), #loginIp#, #region#, #client#, #result# )
sqlMap.delete:
delete from login_history
where date_format(login_time, '%y-%m-%d') < date_format(date_sub(now(), interval 30 day) , '%y-%m-%d')
user_id = #userId#
sqlMap.select:
select
from login_history h
order by h.login_time $order$
limit #firstResult#, #pageSize#
